articles.title: 'I call it financial activism': meet the influencers giving stock tips to millennials - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Millions of young people are now getting their share tips from social media influencers. We meet two of the TikTok's most successful
articles.content: I think there should be some sort of regulation. Anyone can go on the internet and make a video. I study finance so I have a basic understanding already, he added. Im not inventing anything new or pr… [+1757 chars]
